stories.text:
Hello HN!

I'm new to Reddit (always had an unjustified bad opinion about this social network). I've started writing more articles on Medium and trying to get more views/followers by posting them to the relevant sub-reddits.

That said, I don't understand how the notation system works. Every time I hit refresh the number of upvote changed. Even if I hit refresh every half second.

Are there just so many people that downvote and upvote (almost 10s of downvotes AND upvotes per second??) or is that a dark pattern to make you believe there is something happening?
stories.title: Ask HN: What's going on with Reddit's notation system?
